description: A dashboard that monitors OpenCost and focuses on giving a overview for OpenCost. It is created using the [opencost-mixin](https://github.com/adinhodovic/opencost-mixin).

targets.expr: sum(finops_optimization_savings)
sum(finops_optimization_savings) by (recommendation_type)
finops_efficiency_score{job=~"finops-api"}
finops_anomaly_score{job=~"finops-api"}

targets.legendFormat: Current CPU hourly cost vs. 30-day average
Current RAM hourly cost vs. 30-day average
Current PV hourly cost vs. 30-day average

title: OpenCost / Overview
